title: BAE Asset Definitions
description: BuildingSync Asset Extractor Asset Definitions Schema

asset_definitions.description: Array of Asset Definitions to Extract from a BuildingSync File

parent_path.definition: The XML path within which to look for a particular key. There could be multiple instances of the key within the path.

key.definition: The key to look for within the specified path.

name.definition: The name of the asset to extract. For UserDefinedField key, this should match the value of FieldName exactly.

exported_name.definition: The name of the exported asset. This name will be exported as is except for assets of type 'sqft', in which case 'primary' and 'secondary' will prepend the name

type.definition: The type of extraction to perform. Options are: 'age_oldest' to extract the age of the oldest specified asset, 'age_youngest' to extract the age of the most recent specified asset,'avg_sqft' to calculate a weighted average value of a specified asset, 'num' to count the number of specified assets found, and 'sqft' to extract primary and secondary value of a specified asset based on the floor area served.

units.definition: Units associated with the specified asset.
